mapper.select: SELECT u.WX_AVATAR_URL startAvatarUrl, u.WX_NICK_NAME startNickName, u.WX_GENDER startGender, i.START_ID startId, i.CONTENT content, i.CREATE_TIME createTime FROM t_user_information i, t_wx_user u WHERE i.IS_DEL = 0 AND i.RECEIVE_ID = #{receiveId} AND i.CREATE_TIME > #{flagTime} AND u.USER_ID = i.START_ID ORDER BY i.CREATE_TIME DESC
